summary: A lesbian hires a male escort to her sister's wedding. She thinks of a scheme to get her ex-girlfriend back: he dates and dumps the ex.
cast: William Baldwin|Kelly Lynch|Sherilyn Fenn|Joe Pantoliano|Gail Strickland|Cec Verrell|Claire Callaway|Marek Johnson|Monique Mannen|Timothy Stickney|Frank Ray Perilli|Tony Amendola|Keith MacKechnie|Ann Ryerson|Gloria Gifford|Jill Jaress|Ken Magee|Lin Shaye|Joshua Grenrock|Jan A.P. Kaczmarek|Aleksandra Kaniak|Stanislaw Dziedzic|Maria Heggnes|Zbyslaw Kogut|Liliana Overman|Mitchell Group|Tawny Kitaen|Julie Lott|Lyn Alicia Henderson|Lee Arnone|Catherine Battistone|Ed Berke|Pamela Clay|Alex Daniels|Mary Ellen Dunbar|Marzena Czarnecka Jones|Marilyn Madderom|Paul Pape|Peter Tomaszewicz|Janet Wood|Ginger Marin|Michael Milker|Daniel Morton
title: Tres en raya
